ara_information.name: ARA Institute of Canterbury
ara_information.description: ARA provides a wide range of programs, including foundation studies, certificates, diplomas, degrees, and graduate diplomas.

streets.name: Tuam St
streets.position: Northern edge of the main campus block

streets.name: St Asaph St
streets.position: Runs through the campus, between Tuam St and Southwark St

streets.name: High St
streets.position: Runs diagonally from Madras St and St Asaph St
streets.details: starts on the corner of Madras St and St Asaph St

streets.name: Madras St
streets.position: Western edge of the main campus block

streets.name: Southwark St
streets.position: Parallel to St Asaph St, between St Asaph St and Allen St
streets.details: Runs parallel to St Asaph St, starts at Madras St

streets.name: Allen St
streets.position: Parallel to Southwark St, near Moorhouse Ave
streets.details: Runs parallel to Southwark St, starts at Madras St

streets.name: Ferry Rd
streets.position: Runs from St Asaph St towards Barbadoes St
streets.details: starts half way down St Asaph St to Barbadoes St

streets.name: Coventry St
streets.position: Between Williams St and Barbadoes St
streets.details: Short street starting on Barbadoes St and turns 90 degrees into Williams St

streets.name: Williams St
streets.position: Between Ferry Rd and Coventry St
streets.details: Short street starting on Ferry Rd and turns 90 degrees into Coventry St

streets.name: Barbadoes St
streets.position: Eastern edge of the main campus block

streets.name: Moorhouse Ave
streets.position: Southern edge of the main campus block

buildings.label: PX
buildings.name: Püakiaku (Hairdressing)
buildings.location: Corner of High St and Tuam St
buildings.description: Houses Hairdressing and Barbering.

buildings.label: JZ
buildings.name: Music Arts
buildings.location: Adjacent to PX, on High St near Madras St
buildings.description: The specialised building for music programs.

buildings.label: P
buildings.name: Te Wahapa (Plains FM & Broadcasting)
buildings.location: On Madras St, near St Asaph St, adjacent to S & N buildings
buildings.description: Home of the New Zealand Broadcasting School and Plains FM radio station.

buildings.label: T
buildings.name: Taipari (IT Services)
buildings.location: Next to G and U buildings, adjacent to the main courtyard (eastern side)
buildings.description: IT and printing services.

buildings.label: OH
buildings.name: Otautahi House (Student Accommodation)
buildings.location: Across St Asaph St from the main campus block, on the west side of Madras St
buildings.description: On site accommodation for students.

buildings.label: OEDT
buildings.name: Student Accommodation
buildings.location: Across St Asaph St from the main campus block, next to OH
buildings.description: On site accommodation for students.

buildings.label: U
buildings.name: Ihutai (Hospitality, Cookery, Cafe)
buildings.location: Adjacent to the main courtyard (Ferry Rd side), near Ferry Rd
buildings.description: Contains 'Visions' the on Campus Restaurant, 'The pantry' a cafe run by staff and students, Hospitality and Tourism, and Cookery and Bakery.

buildings.label: S
buildings.name: Tawhaki (Applied Sciences & Computing)
buildings.location: Central campus, adjacent to the main courtyard (western side), near Madras St, above N building
buildings.description: Houses Computing and is part of Applied Sciences and Social Practice. Shares central elevators with N building.

buildings.label: N
buildings.name: Tōrea (Business & Early Childhood)
buildings.location: Adjacent to the main courtyard (western side), near Madras St, above X building and shares central elevators with S building.
buildings.description: Home to Early Childhood Education.

buildings.label: D
buildings.name: Marokura (Design Block)
buildings.location: On Madras St, adjacent to Moorhouse Ave, next to DL and DW
buildings.description: Home to Art and Design and Photography. Contains studios and workshops.

buildings.label: L
buildings.name: Library
buildings.location: Part of the Rakaia center, adjacent to the main courtyard (east of X building)
buildings.description: The main campus Library, houses Disability Services, Learning Services, and the Learning Self Access Centre.

buildings.label: X
buildings.name: Student Support / Academic Division
buildings.location: Part of the Rakaia center, adjacent to the Madras St main carpark, below N building
buildings.description: Houses the Information Desk / Admissions & Enrolments, Career Centre, and International Student Advisors. Contains the main Rakaia Center elevators.

buildings.label: A
buildings.name: Administration / Academic
buildings.location: Part of the Rakaia center, next to L block and C block, adjacent to CH building
buildings.description: The main administrative hub, containing Business, Academic Records, Executive, Teacher Education, and the Imagitech Theatre.

buildings.label: G
buildings.name: Te Kei (Administration / Support)
buildings.location: On Williams St, below and attached to T building, adjacent to TM building
buildings.description: Houses Finance, People & Culture, International, Marketing, and Health & Safety Manager.

buildings.label: TM
buildings.name: Te Puna Wānaka (Māori & Pacific Studies)
buildings.location: Near Barbadoes St, above CH building
buildings.description: The centre for Māori and Pacific Studies.

buildings.label: CH
buildings.name: Te Waka Piki Kōtuku (Childcare)
buildings.location: Near Barbadoes St, above W and E buildings
buildings.description: Childcare Facilities.

buildings.label: W
buildings.name: Whareora (Sport & Health)
buildings.location: Large building on Moorhouse Ave and Barbadoes St, adjacent to the main student parking
buildings.description: Contains the Gym Health Centre, The Zone, and Supported Learning.

buildings.label: K
buildings.name: Kahukura (Engineering)
buildings.location: Large building on Moorhouse Ave and west of Barbadoes St, adjacent to the main student parking
buildings.description: Houses Engineering and Architectural Studies.

buildings.label: E
buildings.name: Te Pūtahi (NASDA)
buildings.location: Above K building and next to W building (shares an entrance)
buildings.description: Houses the National Academy of Singing and Dramatic Arts (NASDA).

buildings.label: C
buildings.name: Tahatika (Fashion & Student Lounge)
buildings.location: On Madras St, above D and DL buildings
buildings.description: Houses Fashion, the Student Lounge, Student Voice and Student Events. a good place to meet friends for lunch.

buildings.label: DL
buildings.name: Tuawera (Lecture Theatre)
buildings.location: On Madras St, next to D building
buildings.description: A large, dedicated lecture hall.

buildings.label: HS
buildings.location: On Ferry Road, next to the Bus Stop
buildings.description: Houses the Citizens Advice Bureau and Outdoor Education.

buildings.label: FM
buildings.name: Facilities Management
buildings.location: Near Ferry Rd and Barbadoes St, adjacent to the M blocks
buildings.description: Houses Facilities Management.

buildings.label: O
buildings.name: Kotare (Osteopathic Clinic)
buildings.location: Adjacent to the main courtyard, near Madras St
buildings.description: Houses the Osteopathic Clinic.

buildings.name: Rakaia Center
buildings.location: Central campus, connected L, A and X buildings
buildings.description: An interconnected atrium that combines L, A and X buildings into one space, it is a central hub for student services.

buildings.name: main courtyard
buildings.location: Surrounded by N, S, U, T, G, L, and X buildings
buildings.description: A nice grass area, with seating and trees

parking_areas.name: Madras St main carpark
parking_areas.location: Located on Madras St, between X building and C building, adjacent to N building
parking_areas.details: Limited guest parking and drop off area

parking_areas.name: Student Parking (More Student Carpark)
parking_areas.details: Large student parking lot. Located near the TV and ST buildings.

parking_areas.name: Main student parking
parking_areas.location: On the corner of Barbadoes St and Moorhouse Ave, surrounds W building and extends along Barbadoes St past CH and TM buildings
